my set ups and installation procedures
windows 7 Home basic
1. open the first file in the download folder using winrar, it will make folder pm-btcg.
2. Download Daemontool from Filehippo.com or from anyother website, install deamon tool, and mount the image from the foldr "pm-btcg"
3. it will prompt u to install the game. and install the game using the activation code BRR-394-23242-N6475-69437.
4. Once installation is over , aerosoft launcher gonna pop. do nothing with that, just close it
5. open the new virtual drive on the computer, right click and open it, and u can see a folder postmortem, copy all the files in it and replace it with files in installed directory (eg:C:\ToxSickLabs\Bridge) .
6. From the desktop u can open the Bridge game, which is in yellow colour symbol. and game will succefully play
7. another problem which occured to me is blinkering of the game. i solved it by switching off the ful screen option, from menu-options-graphics-full screen. 
8. For me   resolution of 800* 600  worked well and gud.
9. Game is a simulation, gud for civil engineers, i am mechanical engineer, i liked it, it can be enjoyed by anybody, i suggest a 20 plus age guys can enjoy this well.
10. Enjoy

For all of you with GRAPHIC CARD ERROR in the Startup process of the game. 

I may have a solution worth testing:

If you use Nvidia:
1. Open up your Nvidia-settings
2. Go to: Adjust 3D-settings
3. Open up the tab "Software Settings"
4. Add "Bridge" from your installation directory (eg: C:ProgramBridge)
5. **Save** and close Nvidia-settings

Please leave a comment if it solved the problem!
Good Luck!
